character.statement: Where is that servant with my drink? I'm parched!
About time, lad.
Me? But the servant just--
You said no judgment!
Listen. I know someone stole my goblet. No judgment -- I just want it back.
So I'm going to close my eyes and count to 10, and whoever has my goblet can just put it down.
No one? Okay, we'll try this one more time.
10. I hope the guilty party did the sensible thing and returned my goblet.
Thorlak! How could you betray me like this?
Silence! How can you have the gall to hold it right in front of my face?
I know what I said, you scoundrel! Get out of my sight!
How could my most trusted man steal from me? FROM ME?!
He's always like this when he misplaces his things.
Erik is known for his fierce, unforgiving temper.
I wouldn't be holding that if I were you.
You don't suppose it could be outside the fortress?
Good lad, this tasty beverage should help my parched throat.
This cough is killing me, but I think I'd prefer to keep my head.
I h-h-hope he doesn't think I di-di-did it...
Thanks, this should help calm my nerves.
Th-th-that.. Erik mustn't see you with that!
I don't want to be the one caught with this, but maybe I can find a way to sneak it to someone else.
